DOC.detailed_description: This single-center , phase I study healthy young ( 19-30 year ) elderly ( 60-65 year ) volunteer , conduct four part . In Part 1 , minodronic acid tablet administer young volunteer dose 1 , 2 , 4 mg . In Part 2 , single dose , young volunteer 1-mg dose group receive repeated oral dos minodronic acid daily 7 day . In Part 3 , single oral dose minodronic acid 1 mg administer elderly volunteer . In part 4 , washout period 8 day , volunteer 4-mg dose group receive single dose 4 mg minodronic acid feed condition ( administrate 30 minute high-fat breakfast ) . Plasma sample collect plasma concentration minodronic acid analyze LC-MS/MS . Tolerability assess throughout study physical examination , vital sign measurement , laboratory analysis , monitor adverse effect .
